summary: The diff does not show the required backend change in backend/main.mo. Instead, it contains extensive frontend-related modifications (and deployment log/state file updates) that were not requested and violate the constraint to avoid frontend changes for this task.

frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md (claims a backend fix but does not include code evidence)
